# Master of Magic Lore
## Overview
**Master of Magic Lore**

You are an expert in all matters arcane.

**Benefit:** You add half your wizard level to all [[Knowledge (Skill)|Knowledge]] (arcana) and [[Spellcraft (Skill)|Spellcraft]] checks.

**Source:** Ultimate Options: New Arcane Discoveries (Super Genius Games), pg. 6
